Relacom technologies LTD

Why RTL?
.

Select us from thousands of others, we guarantee...

 

  • High Class Service
  • Reliable prices
  • 24/7 service
  • Cutting edge technologies
  • Highly qualified staff
  • Followup after service
 
     
 

The people at Relacom technologies ltd respond to customer to deliver highest quality, on time, on demand computer products, IT solutions, network services and maintenance for small to medium size business that ensure value and contribute to customer success and satisfaction at very affordable cost.


Relacom mission is to help people and businesses with-in Auckland area. Our IT Technicians are highly qualified with years of experience covering all aspects of computer hardware, software, networking, operating systems, peripheral service and support. They remove virus, spywares, fix errors, remove private internet browsing history, upgrade PCs, Laptops, install networks, and troubleshoot at home and business PC needs.


We love technology and we can always find the right tool for any application that you have in mind.
We are a leading multi-channel computer hardware and software reseller in business since 2008. With a fully fitted workshop, the business delivers a professional computer hardware repairs and sales with added computer software solution to the customers.

Our service at our Auckland store is intended to be cost effective, helping customers to get their computers up and running. Home and office visits to repair computers with proficient telephone support and remote assistance.
